title: $56+ Airfare Sale from Southwest
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $56+ Airfare Sale from Southwest $56+ Airfare Sale from Southwest August 4, 2015 9:25am by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
While it may be only summer, start planning future flights (including fall and winter travel) in order to find the best price and seating options. Southwest has just posted a brand-new sale discounting nonstop flights every day but Fridays and Sundays during August 25, 2015 - February 10, 2016. Among the more than 1,150 routes is travel from 86 U.S. cities. Fares start at $56 one-way ($112 round-trip), and they must be booked by 11:59 p.m. on August 13.

While it may be only summer, start planning future flights (including fall and winter travel) in order to find the best price and seating options. Southwest has just posted a brand-new sale discounting nonstop flights every day but Fridays and Sundays during August 25, 2015 - February 10, 2016. Among the more than 1,150 routes is travel from 86 U.S. cities. Fares start at $56 one-way ($112 round-trip), and they must be booked by 11:59 p.m. on August 13. 
Blackout dates exclude travel during September 3, 4, 7; November 24, 25; November 28 - December 1. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find these promotions on Southwest 's sale page. Pros: Able to plan travel way in advance. Cons:
